body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
H.-Q. Sixth Regiment Kentucky Infantry.
Shelbyville Ky
March 12th 1863.
Thos S. Page Esqr
Dr Sir:
In the absence of Genl Finnell I address you.
I recommend a Major of the 6th Ky Inft Lt Richard T. Whitaker : promoted for gallant conduct at Stone River: vice Geo. T. Shackleford promoted to Lt Colonel!
Please Send me the Commission by tomorrow mail at this place.
The Lieut is extraordinarily well qualified for this position.
Your prompt attention will put me under additional obligation to you.

Your friend
W. C. Whitaker
Col 6th Ky Inft
The Governor directs the issuing of this Com: to be suspended for the present

6 Inf:
Recommendation for Major
Major R. T. Whitaker
filed March 12. 1863
Comm. issd &c as within
